snippet: Ronald Salahuddin had been convicted in federal court of steering demolition contracts and work around the new Prudential Center arena to a favored contractor.
abstract: Ronald Salahuddin, former deputy to Mayor Corey A Booker of Newark, is sentenced to a year and a day in prison for conspiring to commit extortion.
lead_paragraph: Ronald Salahuddin had been convicted in federal court of steering demolition contracts and work around the new Prudential Center arena to a favored contractor.

headline.seo: Former Newark Deputy Mayor Sentenced in Extortion Conspiracy
headline.main: Former Deputy Mayor of Newark Is Sentenced
headline.print_headline: Former Deputy Mayor Of Newark Is Sentenced
